metadata.name: FunctionTemplate
metadata.title: DC Custom Function Template
metadata.description: Plaster template to create an advanced function with tests.
metadata.author: David Christian

parameter.name: FunctionPath
parameter.prompt: Relative path to where the function should be created - must have trailing slash.

parameter.name: TestsPath
parameter.prompt: Relative path to where the test should be created - must have trailing slash.

choice.label: &No
choice.help: Does not add comment based help

choice.label: &Yes
choice.help: Adds pipeline support to the function

choice.label: &No
choice.help: Does not add a pester folder

choice.label: &simple
choice.help: Adds an empty cmdlet binding block

choice.label: &Advanced
choice.help: Adds all options to cmdlet binding

choice.label: &Yes
choice.help: Adds a default parameter for computername

parameter.name: ChangeToScriptLocation
parameter.prompt: Change current directory to PSScriptRoot, during main part of script, and back again on return.

choice.label: &Yes
choice.help: Change current directory to PSScriptRoot and back again

choice.label: &No
choice.help: Leaves current directory as it is
